summary: REQ-23 focuses on swapping out the existing “female flash card” hero image with a full‑stack themed static asset while keeping the Hero layout/styling intact and not changing copy/site structure. The diff shows modifications to HeroSection.tsx and metadata/state summary files, but does not show any new/updated image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and it appears to change Hero text/copy which is explicitly a non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the Hero section right-side image (/assets/generated/profile.dim_900x1100.png) with a full-stack development themed image using the same static-asset approach (served from frontend/public/assets/generated), ensuring the old “female flash card” image no longer appears anywhere.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added/removed files and does not show any modification/addition of the replacement image asset (e.g., profile-fullstack.dim_900x1100.png) under frontend/public/assets/generated. The only concrete code shown references background/accent images, not the profile image replacement.
evidence: <file-diff>: Added: 0, Removed: 0 (no new asset file present)
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx (truncated) shows src for hero-bg-light and accent-orb-light, but no shown update to /assets/generated/profile.dim_900x1100.png
BuildRequest specifies: profile.dim_900x1100.png > profile-fullstack.dim_900x1100.png; no such change is evidenced in diff

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Hero section copy/text content (headline and paragraph) even though the request explicitly lists changing Hero copy/text as a non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says not to change copy/text content; the diff shows the Hero h1 and paragraph text content being different.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx: h1 text is "Full-Stack Web & Application Developer" and paragraph about "Crafting exceptional digital experiences..."

hallucinated_features.description: Modified social icon implementation/imports (lucide-react icons vs react-icons) and potentially other Hero behavior unrelated to the requested image swap.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 asks to keep change limited to replacing the unwanted image and updating references; changing icon libraries/unused imports is outside the requested scope.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx: imports include both lucide-react (ArrowDown, Mail, Github, Linkedin) and react-icons (SiGithub, SiLinkedin), and the rendered icons shown use SiGithub/SiLinkedin
